remarks:
An integer greater than or equal to 3 decreased by 2 is a positive integer, analogous to ~ uz2m1nn .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Sep-2018.)

 An integer greater than or equal to 3 decreased by 2 is a positive integer.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Sep-2018.)
